sentences.en: Does anyone doubt that we live in an age of incivility , of distrust of other cultures?
sentences.cn: 有人怀疑过我们处在一种粗野、不信任其他文化的时代里？

sentences.en: It is gross incivility to refuse answer when spoken to.
sentences.cn: 当人家找你说话时拒绝答应是极其无礼的事.

sentences.en: It is unclear how this fits with Mr Obama's oft-repeated pledges to bring a "new tone" to Washington, reach out to Republicans and work to end partisanship and incivility.
sentences.cn: 奥巴马一再保证要给华盛顿带来“新风格”，与共和党人展开合作，并努力结束党争和粗鲁。 然而他的言语不实该如何同他这些多次重复的承诺协调一致呢？

sentences.en: Was not this some excuse for incivility , if I was uncivil?
sentences.cn: 即使我刚才真是无礼,难道这不是我无礼的某种起因 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 粗鲁，粗野，不礼貌的行为
